This is my 2nd time visiting this clinic since I moved here 8 or 9 years ago. I was pleasantly surprised. Dr Tan Wee Chuan is a pleasure to speak to. He shows concern, explains clearly the possible issues and shares the different medical interventions I can consider. My wife swears by the clinic and I have never thought much about it. But I do know now why. Kudos to Dr Tan and team! I guess I have found a new family doctor!

I want to take a moment to express my deepest gratitude to Dr. Tan at Island Family Clinic. Dr. Tan Wee Chuan, you are truly exceptional. Your patience and willingness to listen make a world of difference. It's clear that you genuinely care about your patients, and your gentle and understanding nature always makes me feel safe and comfortable. Thank you for putting the needs and well-being of your patients first.

I also want to give a big shout-out to Rachel, the clinic receptionist. Rachel, your understanding and willingness to go the extra mile have not gone unnoticed. You are always so polite, friendly, and ready to help with a smile. Your excellent service makes each visit to the clinic a positive experience.

Thank you, Dr. Tan and Rachel, for your outstanding care and kindness. Your dedication truly shines through in everything you do.

â€”

Wee Keat
There are 2 doctors on duty. Professional and mostly friendly. 1 of the kind private clinic around.

Excellent Doctor Tan! Very patient with my questions that I have about my baby. I have a list and he patiently answered every single one without rushing. Very good with baby/toddler. Gentle when checking them, will communicate with the child too.
